definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through

sentences.english: Fill someone’s hair-dryer with baby powder.
sentences.chinese: 在别人的电吹风里塞些婴儿爽身粉。

sentences.english: I have to buy a blow dryer.
Do not use a hair dryer or other direct heat source.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用电吹风或其他直接热源。

sentences.english: I ask if he'll do an impression of Fergie's famous "hairdryer" blasting?
sentences.chinese: 我问他对弗格森传说中的“电吹风”有什么感想？

sentences.english: Generally, the air outlet accessory of the existing electric hair drier is used for blowing hairs.
sentences.chinese: 现有的电吹风出风附件，一般都是用于吹发的。

sentences.english: Assume that want faster drab can use hair dryer.
sentences.chinese: 假定想要快些单调能够用电吹风。

sentences.english: Should the hair be blow dried or air dried?
sentences.chinese: 头发应该用电吹风吹干还是让它自然干呢？

sentences.english: The hair dryer trick can squeeze a few more pages out of a cartridge after the printer declares it is empty.
sentences.chinese: 电吹风能在打印机声明墨盒已空后多打出几页纸。

sentences.english: In a Chinese medicine clinique two patients who suffer from prosopoplegia are using hair dryers to cure themselves.
sentences.chinese: 中医诊所里，两位面瘫患者用电吹风自我进行热疗。

sentences.english: They do this so that people can dry their hair using an electric hair drier!
sentences.chinese: 他们作这些事好让人们能用电吹风吹头发。
我可以借一下电吹风吗？

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
